definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Tell your friends and relatives about Excellent's free mortgage referral and consulting services.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你的親友們有關卓譽的免費按揭轉介及諮詢服務。

sentences.english: In the holiday between the relatives and friends mutually congratulates , the gift, the expression is mutually friendly.
sentences.chinese: 節日裏親友之間相互祝賀，互贈禮品，表示友好。

sentences.english: Some of us have dear friends and family to go home to.
sentences.chinese: 我們中的一些還可以和親友家人一起回家。

sentences.english: Dining room is at ordinary times family dines jointly or the life space of repast of fete relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 餐室是平時家人共同進餐或宴請親友就餐的生活空間。

sentences.english: Send an E-mail and thank relatives and friends for relatives and friends' care too, believe and accept in unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 也發個電子郵件感謝親友的關心，不料信一收進來。

sentences.english: They are also elegant and valuable presents for your friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 唐三彩還可以作爲高雅而珍貴的禮品來饋贈親友。

sentences.english: The result is often hilarious photos and videos from friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 成果通常是滑稽的照片和親友們的視頻。

sentences.english: Kin-folk come to see Yvonne by the dozen.
sentences.chinese: 親友們成羣結隊來看伊娃擠得水泄不通。

sentences.english: First and second PFLAG meetings held in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 第一屆，二屆同志親友組織大會在廣州舉行。

sentences.english: Or maybe the child has gotten unbearable flack for his or her name from relatives or friends.
sentences.chinese: 或者孩子難以忍受親友對其名字的演繹。

sentences.english: Anyway, when I finally told Mom, she immediately joined Parents and Friends of Lesbians and Gays.
sentences.chinese: 當我最後告訴我媽時，她馬上加入同性戀親友團。

sentences.english: He wanted to show his sympathy for the bereaved.
sentences.chinese: 他想向死者親友表示慰問。

sentences.english: Me with two proud moms from PFLAG China.
sentences.chinese: 我和同性戀親友會兩位同志媽媽的合影。

sentences.english: Members can then create a physical cookbook. This is great for gifts.
sentences.chinese: 會員可據此自創一本食譜書，用它饋贈親友。

sentences.english: He had acquired secrets which enabled him to blackmail the Chancellor and many of the Kaiser's intimates.
sentences.chinese: 他掌握了可以要挾宮中大臣和皇帝親友的各種祕密。

sentences.english: The man is still single and hasn't told any friends or relatives about his windfall so far.
sentences.chinese: 這位彩民依然單身，並沒有把“中彩”的事告訴親友。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to be present/to be on the scene
